column1: Local Foods////Love love love this place! The sandwiches are amazing! I got the crunchy chicken and my mother ordered the market veggie. Everything tasted so good and really fresh. We got quinoa
column4: and Cole slaw as sides. Those were also very good and went well with the sandwiches. The meal felt really light and healthy. I didn't finish my sandwich because it was pretty big. Will probably come back again!
